HiddenText.Name: Is audio chat enough, or do we need to use video?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Is audio chat enough, or do we need to use video?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: If at all possible, it's best to use video as you talk with your assigned student, since non-verbal, visual cues can be a great help in understanding what is being said (both by you and by your partner). However, if you have slow connections, or if you're simply having trouble with the video component, you may use audio only. We'd prefer that over not talking at all!
